title: The Tear | 2.6
description:
Newly freed, Sara joins Noah in the vents and embarks on a detour to find a weapon that could very well turn the tides in their favour; provided they can get there fast enough…and alive. 
CAST
Narrator – Mike Howorun
Noah – Brady Roberts
Sara – Greta Carew-Johns
Palmer – Kamy Bruder
Soldier 7 – Matthew Hall
Woman’s Voice – Nao Marine
Soldiers 8 and 10 – Steve Sauve
Soldier 9 – Zach Marchand
Editing and Sound Design – Matthew Hall & Mike Howorun
Post Production Producer - Rob Johnston
Written/Directed – Mike Howorun
Produced by - Matthew Hall, Brady Roberts, Mike Howorun, Dila Velazquez
Created by Mike Howorun & Brady Roberts
Contact: escapingdenverpod@gmail.com
Instagram: @escapingdenver
Reddit: r/escapingdenver
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Newly freed, Sara joins Noah in the vents and embarks on a detour to find a weapon that could very well turn the tides in their favour; provided they can get there fast enough…and alive. 

CAST
